title: Fairy Tale of the Demon Princess - Novel Updates
tags: Character Growth   Cute Story   Dwarfs   Misunderstandings   Oneshot   Protagonist Strong from the Start

description: Short story depicting the backstory of the dwarf princess Françoise, who would eventually encounter and befriend Yurushia, the golden devil princess.>
